intent_template: The person in the video {description}. Can you {description2}?
intent: The person in the video says they are from a certain university. Can you tell me the email of the poster of the cheapest bike from the city the university is based in?
intermediate_intent: What university did the person in the video say they attend?

instantiation_dict.description: says they are from a certain university
instantiation_dict.description2: tell me the email of the poster of the cheapest bike from the city the university is based in
